description: Meat free mince works well in Asian dishes like this sticky stir fry, soaking up all the flavours of the sauce.
name: Thai Inspired Sticky Plant Based Mince Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, green and red, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice according to pack instructions and set aside. Heat half the oil in a large wok on a high heat and fry the mince for 5-6 minutes until browned.
Add the onion, capsicums and carrots to the pan and cook for 4-5 minutes, then add the garlic, ginger and red chilli and cook for 2 minutes.
Whisk together the sweet chilli sauce, rice wine vinegar, soy sauce and remaining sesame oil and add to the wok. Cook for 2 minutes until sticky and bubbling.
Serve the mince in bowls with rice.
